long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your talent sourcing with Recruit Robin. Unlock several powerful features by installing the chrome extension. Thanks to the Extension you will benefit from live data of candidates, frequent notifications of when a new relevant candidate has updated their profile so you can be the first one to reach them and help them make their next successful move in their career.
